valid: For the period 12:00 (UTC) on Sun 28 Sep 2025 to 12:00 (UTC) on Mon 29 Sep 2025
general_synopsis: Low Portugal 1005 expected Spain 1013 by 0600 tomorrow. New high expected northern England 1026 by same time

Viking.text:
Wind
In west, southerly 5 or 6, becoming variable 2 to 4. In east, southeasterly 6 to gale 8, decreasing 3 to 5.
Sea state
In west, rough becoming moderate, occasionally slight later. in east, rough becoming moderate, occasionally slight later in east.
Weather
In west, rain then fair. In east, occasional rain.
Visibility
In west, poor becoming good. In east, moderate or good, occasionally poor.
Viking.gale_warning:
Gale warning
Issued:
09:49 (UTC) on Sun 28 Sep 2025
Southeasterly gale force 8 continuing

thwesterly 4 to 6, occasionally 3 in south and east. In north, cyclonic gale 6 to gale 8, occasionally severe gale 9 at first.
